text: hello <!channel>, hope you're having a good day. please be aware that we'll be having a tutorial session for the week's career exercise tomorrow (*developing curiosity and the ability to ask good questions*). kindly check the tutorial guidelines in your folder so that you can prepare at least one question for the tomorrow's q/a session. please be aware that your participation in the q/a will have an impact on the exercise grade.:clinking_glasses:
